original_text: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have continued with us. But they went out, that it might become plain that they all are not of us.
korean_text: 그들이 우리에게서 나갔으나 우리에게 속하지 아니하였나니 만일 우리에게 속하였더라면 우리와 함께 거하였으려니와 그들이 나간 것은 다 우리에게 속하지 아니함을 나타내려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: but they were not of us;
for if they had been of us,
they would have continued with us.
that they all are not of us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 모두가 우리에게 속하지 않았다는 것입니다.
